title: Minecraft 1.6 新版本特性说唱
author: 冰块⑨号
txt_content:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNTc2NjAxMDA0/v.swf

在官方论坛首页找到的：
http://www.minecraftforum.net/news/840-community-creations-16-update-in-a-nutshell/
Can't be bothered to read the massive laundry list of 1.6 changes? Not sure what to look forward to in the new update? Fret no more! YourMCAdmin has put together a catchy song that covers all the awesome features of 1.6, and...you know what, stop reading this, and watch it. Watch it now. It is so worth it!觉得阅读 1.6 新版本特性太麻烦？不确定应该对新的升级期待些什么？现在你将不会有更多的烦恼！YourMCAdmin（作者）已经帮你把这些东西做成了一首朗朗上口的歌，里面包括了所有非常棒非常厉害的新功能，还有……你猜怎么着，别看这个。现在就去看看视频。这太值得了！
